mainEntity.name: How can I add custom fonts to the Flex Shopify theme?

acceptedAnswer.text: To add custom fonts to the Flex Shopify theme, you need to upload the font files to your Shopify store, modify the theme's CSS, and reference the new font in the theme settings. Use custom CSS in the theme editor or directly within the theme's code to apply the custom fonts to specific text elements.

mainEntity.name: Is the Flex theme compatible with Shopify's Online Store 2.0?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the Flex theme is fully compatible with Shopify's Online Store 2.0. This allows you to use the section-based editing for all pages, giving you more flexibility and control over how your store is designed. The drag-and-drop interface and custom content blocks are enhanced with Online Store 2.0 features.

mainEntity.name: Can I translate the Flex theme into multiple languages?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the Flex theme supports multilingual functionality. Shopify allows merchants to add multiple languages to their stores, and you can use third-party translation apps or Shopify's native language feature to translate content. The Flex theme works seamlessly with these tools to display translations across your store.
